title: Can fountain pens be used in drawing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Can fountain pens be used in drawing?  Not only that that can be used fo drawing, they are the go-to-tool for fine and very fine lines.

I think there’s no limit in art. You can use anything you like to draw or create something. There are a lot of art styles and some even use unconventional materials in creating art. A lot of artists actually use fountain pens for drawing.
